Class DamageStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.player.damagestatus.DamageStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Representable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrenzyAfter, FrenzyBefore, HighDamage, LowDamage, MediumDamage

    public abstract class DamageStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements Representable
    This class represents the status of the player that decides which actions it can take.
